Name: Cardiology Clinic
Description: Specializes in diagnosing and treating heart conditions including coronary artery disease, heart failure, and arrhythmias

Name: Pediatric Care Center
Description: Comprehensive care for children of all ages, from newborns to adolescents, including preventive care and treatment of illnesses

Name: Neurology Department
Description: Diagnosis and treatment of neurological disorders including stroke, epilepsy, multiple sclerosis, and Parkinson's disease

Name: Orthopedic Surgery Center
Description: Specialized in bone and joint surgeries, sports injuries, joint replacements, and spine surgeries

Name: Dermatology Practice
Description: Skin care and treatment center focusing on acne, eczema, psoriasis, skin cancer screenings, and cosmetic dermatology

Name: ENT Specialists
Description: Ear, nose, and throat conditions treatment including hearing disorders, sinus issues, voice disorders, and sleep apnea

Name: Ophthalmology Center
Description: Complete eye care services including vision exams, cataract surgery, glaucoma treatment, and LASIK procedures

Name: Obstetrics & Gynecology
Description: Women's health and pregnancy care, including prenatal care, labor and delivery, reproductive health, and gynecological surgeries

Name: General Surgery Department
Description: Comprehensive surgical services including abdominal surgeries, hernia repairs, appendectomies, and minimally invasive procedures

Name: Internal Medicine Practice
Description: Comprehensive adult primary care, including preventive medicine, chronic disease management, and general health maintenance

Name: Urology Center
Description: Diagnosis and treatment of urinary tract disorders, kidney stones, prostate issues, and male reproductive health problems

Name: Psychiatry Department
Description: Mental health services including diagnosis and treatment of depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, and other psychiatric conditions

Name: Radiology Department
Description: Advanced diagnostic imaging services including X-ray, CT, MRI, ultrasound, and nuclear medicine
